title: Fresh Salad
ingredients: Lettuce, tomato, cucumber, onion, olive oil, lemon juice
instructions: Chop vegetables, mix with dressing, and serve fresh.

title: Chocolate Cake
ingredients: Flour, cocoa powder, eggs, sugar, butter, baking powder
instructions: Mix ingredients, bake at 180°C for 30 minutes, cool and serve.

title: Creamy Pasta
ingredients: Pasta, cream, garlic, cheese, olive oil, herbs
instructions: Boil pasta, prepare cream sauce, mix together and garnish with herbs.

title: Classic Biryani
ingredients: Basmati rice, chicken, yogurt, spices, onions, saffron
instructions: Marinate chicken, cook rice, layer both with spices, and cook on low heat.

title: Paneer Butter Masala
instructions: Sauté spices, add tomato puree and cream, then add paneer cubes.
